author: John Freund
title: Madonna Looks Creepy In New Video (Video)
text:
Madonna’s fans are concerned after the singer posted a //Valentine’s Day video in which some say she looks ‘creepy’ (video below).
The Daily Mail reports that fans have taken to social media to respond to Madonna’s latest video in which she sings ‘happy Valentine’s Day’ to all the ‘rebel hearts’ out there.  The video was taken by Madonna as she was recovering in bed from an illness.  She captioned the video with: 
Sick Girl in bed in. Her nightgown. Not sung well but done with [love]! Happy Valentine's Day!!
Many feel as though she both looked and sounded strange. 
One follower wrote: 'Just me or a bit evil looking?'

Another said: 'She looks horrible. Way too  much work done!'

One claimed: 'U know she was drunk when she sang to us right? Sorry madonna I love u but ur eyes are bloodshot red.' 

Another said: 'You're honestly so beautiful despite being sick, wow please be mine I hope you had a great Valentine's Day and got all the love you deserve!' 
Madonna recently completed the adoption of a pair of twins from Malawi.  She wrote of the incident:
I can officially confirm I have completed the process of adopting twin sisters from Malawi and am overjoyed that they are now part of our family. I am deeply grateful to all those in Malawi who helped make this possible and I ask the media please to respect our privacy during this transitional time. Thank you also to my friends, family and my very large team for all your support and love!
